issue.title: [R] Support creating ScalarExpressions for more data types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7093](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7093). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/r/src/expression.cpp#L93-L107. ARROW-6340 was limited to integer/double/logical. This will let us make dataset filter expressions with all those other types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7093?focusedCommentId=17020405) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6201
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6201>
